rules_text:
Whenever Royal Jewel enters the battlefield, if it was cast, conjure three cards named Royal Jewel and shuffle them into your library.
{T}: Add one mana of any one color. If you control two or more other artifacts, add two mana of any one color instead.
At the beginning of your combat, if you control six or more artifacts, transform Royal Jewel.
rules_text2:
Flying, trample, indestructible, haste
Lords of the Hive is all colors.
